meanings.definition: The act of dialing a telephone number automatically.
meanings.sent1: Autodialing can save time by dialing numbers automatically.
meanings.sent2: The autodialing feature on my phone makes calling friends easy.
meanings.sent3: I wish my alarm clock had autodialing to call me in the morning.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers moved like lightning, as if she had autodialing built in.
meanings.sent5: The robot's autodialing was so efficient, it dialed the entire phone book in seconds.

meanings.definition: A system or device that automatically dials telephone numbers.
meanings.sent1: Our office uses an autodialing system to reach customers quickly.
meanings.sent2: The autodialing device on the desk dialed the emergency hotline.
meanings.sent3: The autodialing machine hummed happily as it dialed each number.
meanings.sent4: The autodialing system was like having a personal assistant for calls.
meanings.sent5: With the autodialing technology, making calls became effortless.
